revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lake Verity |image = [[File:Lake Verity.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Lake Verity. |tokens = 72,500 |location = West of Route 201. }} '''Lake Verity''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,068,735 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck || [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat, [[File:Murkrow.png|40px]] Murkrow |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck || [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen || rowspan=2|[[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || rowspan=2|[[File:Stunky.png|40px]] Stunky, [[File:Houndour.png|40px]] Houndour |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Starly.png|40px]] Starly || rowspan=2|[[File:Galactic_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || rowspan=2|[[File:Houndour.png|40px]] Houndour, [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow |- | [[File:Bidoof.png|40px]] Bidoof |}
